datepicker.gmt-convertion: Date will be converted to GMT +0

add-analysis.modal-desc: Select the analysis you want to add
add-analysis.disabled-option-desc: Your layer geometry is %{inputGeometryType} and this analysis needs %{requiredInputGeometries}

buffer.title: Buffer
buffer.desc: Calculate the area of influence of a layer determined by distance.

trade-area.title: Trade Areas
trade-area.desc: Calculate the area of a layer determined by walking, driving, or biking time, or just by distance

point-in-polygon.title: Point in polygon
point-in-polygon.desc: Analyse points in polygon (or vice versa)

add-widgets.modal-desc: Select the widgets you want to add
add-widgets.time-series-no-option-desc: This option won't show your time-series widget

add-layer.modal-desc: Select an existing dataset or connect a new one

imports.demo-email-title: I am interested in the %{name} connector
imports.demo-email-desc: Hi, I am interested in testing the %{name} connector. Please, contact me to schedule a demo of this feature.

tab-options-error.no-key: %{name} key is not specified and panel can't be enabled
tab-options-error.not-allowed: %{name} data source is not available in your plan. Please upgrade
tab-options-error.limits-reached: You've reached the limits for your account. Please upgrade
tab-options-error.no-credits: You've reached the available %{name} credits for your account this month

form-import.error-desc: Error. Your URL doesn’t look correct.
form-import.title: Enter a url
form-import.desc: Paste a URL and start the import

header-import.import-url: Import your data from a %{brand} URL
header-import.select-a-file: or select a file like CSV, XLS, ZIP, KML, GPX,
header-import.sync-enabled: Keep it synchronized with the source
header-import.upload-file-url: Upload a file or a URL |||| Upload a URL

service-import.no-results-desc: We haven't found any valid file from your account
service-import.state-idle-login: Log in with your account and select any item.
service-import.state-error: We are sorry, can’t connect to your %{title} account. Just in case it helps, be sure you have the pop-up blocker deactivated for this website.
service-import.state-retrieving: A list of your %{title} files will be displayed in a moment.
service-import.state-selected-sync: You can also choose when to sync the file.
service-import.state-selected-instagram: A map containing all your georeferenced photos will be created

selected-state.upgrade-desc: Upgrade your account to get sync options and %{features}

twitter.credits-consumed: Twitter credits for this period consumed - %{extraTweets} will be charged
twitter.fallback-desc: The %{brand} Connector allows you to map %{brand} activity data related to your Brand, Event or any term you may be interested in.
twitter.terms-desc: Enter up to four search terms using the category fields.
twitter.terms-placeholder: Insert your terms separated by commas
twitter.title: Twitter trends

arcgis.fallback-desc: Enable the %{brand} connector in your account to connect your %{brand} data to CartoDB and mantain it in sync with the source.
arcgis.url-desc: To retrieve a particular layer, add the layer index at the end of the URL
arcgis.import-data: Import your data from an %{brand} instance
arcgis.sync-options: Sync options only available for a layer

instagram.fallback-desc: Enable the %{brand} connector to map your photos or videos from your account in CartoDB.

box.fallback-desc: Enable the %{brand} connector in your account to map your %{brand} files in CartoDB or mantain your CartoDB maps in sync with your Box data.

mailchimp.fallback-desc: Enable the %{brand} connector in your account to map your user lists from %{brand} in CartoDB or mantain your CartoDB maps in sync with your %{brand} data.
mailchimp.state-idle: Connect your %{brand} account to select any of your campaigns.
mailchimp.state-error: We are sorry, It has been an error while connecting to your %{brand} account. Just in case it helps, be sure you have the pop-up blocker deactivated for this website.
mailchimp.state-retrieving: A list of your %{brand} campaigns will be displayed in a moment.

salesforce.fallback-desc: Enable the %{brand} connector in your account to map your user lists from %{brand} in CartoDB or mantain your CartoDB maps in sync with your %{brand} data.

error.title: Oouch! There has been an error loading your datasets
error.desc: If the problem persists contact us at

no-datasets.title: You have not connected any datasets yet
no-datasets.desc: You can %{connectDataset} or %{search} in all our data library

no-results.desc: There are no results in this page

footer.guessing-desc: Let CartoDB automatically guess data types and content on import.

footer.privacy-change-banned: You cannot change the privacy of your new datasets.

error.default-desc: Reload the page again. If the problem persists contact us at support@cartodb.com

analysis-form.placeholder-text: You have not added any analysis yet. Add new analysis to discover new things.

widgets-form.placeholder-text: You have not added any widgets yet. Add new widgets to discover new things.
